Description.Text: Casa Bianca Boutique Hotel is a friendly 4-star property offering modern accommodation in Koutouloufari, north Crete. Highlights include an outdoor pool, a restaurant, bar and free Wi-Fi. Koutouloufari is a charming village with paved narrow streets and traditional stone houses. It is set on the slopes above Hersonissos, approximately 25km east of Heraklion. Places of interest include several beaches, Cretaquarium Thalassocosmos, Aquaworld Aquarium and the ruins of the Palace of Knossos. The hotel is housed in a Cycladic-style mid-rise complex. Facilities include an outdoor pool. Standard rooms are decorated in a modern style. They boast a private veranda. Amenities include tea and coffee equipment, air-conditioning, free Wi-Fi, a fridge, safe, flat-screen TV and an en-suite bathroom with complimentary toiletries and a bathtub or shower. The onsite restaurant serves local cuisine in a relaxed setting, while guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the poolside bar. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
